id.description: The unique identifier of the item.

assets.description: Information about any asset associated with the item.

created_at.description: The date and time the asset was created.

file_extension.description: The file extension of the asset.

file_size.description: The size of the asset file.

id.description: The unique identifier of the asset.

original_geometry.description: The original geometry of the asset.

public_url.description: The public URL where the asset can be accessed.

uploaded_by.description: Information about the user who uploaded the asset.

id.description: The user ID of the person who uploaded the asset.

url_thumbnail.description: The URL to the thumbnail image of the asset.

board.description: Information about the board to which the item belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the board.

column_values.description: Values of the columns associated with the item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the column value.

text.description: The text value of the column.

type.description: The type of the column value.

value.description: The actual value of the column.

display_value.description: The display value of the column.

created_at.description: The date and time the item was created.

creator_id.description: The user ID of the creator of the item.

group.description: Information about the group to which the item belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the group.

parent_item.description: Information about the parent item, if any.

id.description: The unique identifier of the parent item.

subscribers.description: Users who are subscribed to the item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the subscriber.

updated_at.description: The date and time the item was last updated.

updated_at_int.description: The updated timestamp of the item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the update.
